snippet.title: Dread Templar - Full Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Dread Templar is leaving Early Access today!
A fast-paced hardcore old-school FPS, combining classic 90s shooter and modern FPS elements. Unlock and combine dozens of weapon upgrades and skills, embrace the Dread Force and obliterate hordes of fiendish enemies. Become the scariest thing in hell and get your revenge!

Get the game now on:
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1334730/Dread_Templar/
GOG - https://www.gog.com/game/dread_templar
Epic Games Store - https://www.epicgames.com/store/p/dread-templar-d8e8fa

Blast your way through hordes of diverse demonic and fiendish enemies and prevail in up to ten thrilling boss fights. Explore the many distinct, unique campaign environments: from the dark realm of hell to frozen pirate ships, all rendered in retro, but surprisingly detailed pixel-art graphics style, supercharged by a head-banging original soundtrack.

Follow us:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/FulqrumPublishing
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/FulqrumPublishing
Website: http://www.FulqrumPublishing.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FulqrumPublishing/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/FulqrumPub
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/FulqrumPublishing/

#Retro #FPS #DreadTemplar
